transcript: (upbeat music) - Thank you guys all for coming to this meeting. I just have a very, just a quick little announcement that we might be having a few new additions to the family. I know, I know, by this time normally, we would have already had our new family member here, but it's okay. Things have been delayed. It's been a crazy year. You guys have all been through a lot. We've all been through a lot together and I'm glad that we could be here, because on October 13th, that is when we will find out more about our new friend. I know I'm really excited too. Do you guys have any questions? Can I answer anything for you? Any concerns? Oh, will it have USB-C? I don't know. I'm not gonna get into rumors. I feel like that's something that I've done in the past. And now nearing the moment that we're gonna find out all of the information I don't want, I don't want any more spoilers. I don't, I just, that's a good question, that's fair. Anybody else? No, this does not mean that we love you any less. It just means we have a new member of the family. This has nothing to do with the fact that you're not 5G or this has nothing to do with that. It's just, and I understand your concern. I completely, I get it. If anybody gets it, I get it. Okay, I hope that we're all very excited for this moment. It's something that we've all been waiting for. And I look forward to bringing home our new family member, members, for you guys all to meet them. Thank you for coming to this meeting. - [Man] Maybe look at the camera and be like okay, that was silly, but let's talk about the new iPhone. - No, that's it the video is over. - [Man] Oh that's the vedio. - That's it. - [Man] Oh, okay. - No, I'm just kidding. I don't really know. (laughs) Guys, I don't even know what to say really. I'm just really excited for the new iPhone. Obviously you guys, this is something that I look forward to. Basically I revolve my entire year around when the iPhone is gonna be launched. And I think we really did expect this to be released later. We don't really know. And at that point, you know, we're gonna wait until 13th, the big event, they sent the invites out today on Tuesday the 6th. And it's crazy because I woke up this morning and as I was walking the dog my first thought was, feels like iPhone season. Like I just sensed it. I tweeted, then 15 minutes later in my email, I received the invite to the Hi, Speed. And my sister, Jenna, actually sent me her invite first because I was busy editing. And then I saw her text message come through. And I, (laughs) this is really silly but I thought that they had like mistyped her name. And it took me a second to realize no, they were saying hello to speed because that must mean something speedy is around the corner.
